entries.name: available_tags(uri)
entries.desc: return the tag_names for setters associated with uri

entries.name: class_name(uri, tag_name)
entries.desc: retrieve ::class_name for the supplied uri and tag_name If it doesn't exist, capitalize the tag_name

entries.name: install_class_name(uri, tag_name, class_name)
entries.desc: record ::class_name for the supplied uri and tag_name

entries.name: setter(uri, tag_name)
entries.desc: return the setter for the uri, tag_name pair, or nil.

entries.name: uri_registered?(uri, name)
entries.desc: test if this uri is registered against this name
